timer.name: ⏲ Timer
timer.description: Allows you to find out how long the game will last.

cloak.name: 🧥 Cloak
cloak.description: Cancels the penalty for the rain event.

tooling.name: 🛠 Tooling
tooling.description: Speed up the collection of food.

bear_recipe.name: 📜 Teddy bear recipe
bear_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a bear for sleep.

clothing_recipe.name: 📜 Clothing Recipe
clothing_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a beautiful leather jacket.

torch.name: 🔥 Torch
torch.description: While gathering food, there is a chance to find more exquisite herbs.

torch_recipe.name: 📜 Torch Recipe
torch_recipe.description: A recipe for creating a torch that will light your way.

drink_recipe.name: 📜 Drink recipe
drink_recipe.description: Recipe for making a disgusting tasting, but medicinal drink.

meat_recipe.name: 📜 Meat Recipe
meat_recipe.description: Who doesn't love to eat a piece of well-cooked meat? The dinosaur will not refuse either.

salad_recipe.name: 📜 Salad Recipe
salad_recipe.description: Isn't the dinosaur tired of eating only grass? Maybe it's better to make a salad from several herbs? My dinosaur loved the result!

soup_recipe.name: 📜 Soup Recipe
soup_recipe.description: 'Fish live in water, why do I eat it dry?' - That's what every dinosaur probably thinks, he just hasn't tried fish soup yet.

hiking_bag.name: 👜 Camping pouch
hiking_bag.description: Increases the chance of travel events.

pouch_recipe.name: 📜 Pouch recipe
pouch_recipe.description: During the journey, the dinosaur needs a place to store all the things he finds, a camping bag will help us here!

gear_recipe.name: 📜 Gear Recipe
gear_recipe.description: The most important component in the mechanism.

crossbow_recipe.name: 📜 Crossbow Recipe
crossbow_recipe.description: Crossbow - powerful, fast, durable. Perfect for hunting!

taco_recipe.name: 📜 Taco Recipe
taco_recipe.description: Tacos, a superb food that all dinosaurs of all kinds adore!

onion_recipe.name: 📜 Onion Recipe
onion_recipe.description: A bow made of a couple of bones, shoots properly.

backpack_recipe.name: 📜 Backpack Recipe
backpack_recipe.description: A school backpack equipped for the dungeon.

leather_jacket_recipe.name: 📜 Leather jacket
leather_jacket_recipe.description: Almost like a shield, but much lighter.

pickaxe_recipe.name: 📜 Pickaxe Recipe
pickaxe_recipe.description: The pickaxe is not effective in battle, because everyone knows that the axe is a more formidable weapon. But it is effective in the extraction of resources.

axe_recipe.name: 📜 Axe Recipe
axe_recipe.description: An axe is not effective in battle, because everyone knows that a sword is a faster weapon. But it is effective in the extraction of resources.

candy_recipe.name: 📜 Candy Recipe
candy_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a whole bunch of chocolates

popcorn_recipe.name: 📜 Popcorn Recipe
popcorn_recipe.description: Recipe for creating popcorn. It's time to watch the movie!

juice_recipe.name: 📜 Juice recipe
juice_recipe.description: Recipe for creating freshly squeezed juice

steak_recipe.name: 📜 Steak Recipe
steak_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a spicy but delicious steak

broth_recipe.name: 📜 Broth Recipe
broth_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a rich meat broth

sushi_recipe.name: 📜 Sushi Recipe
sushi_recipe.description: Recipe for creating sushi. They say it's a perfectly balanced meal

hot_chocolate_recipe.name: 📜 Hot Chocolate Recipe

cake_recipe.name: 📜 Cake Recipe
cake_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a large cake. Cake is a lie

curry_recipe.name: 📜 Curry Recipe

berry_pie_recipe.name: 📜 Berry pie recipe

bento_recipe.name: 📜 Bento Recipe

sandwich_recipe.name: 📜 Sandwich recipe

book_mountains.name: 📔 The Book of Mountains

book_magic-forest.name: 📔 The Book of the Magic Forest
book_magic-forest.description: A book by a long-forgotten adventurer.

rubik_cube.description: The dinosaur always has his favorite game with him.

fishing_rod_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a fishing rod.

meow_book.name: 📔 Meow Edition
meow_book.description: mi mi, mi mi mi... mi!

repair_tool.description: A set for repairing accessories, weapons, armor. Repairs only broken items!

repair_tool_recipe.name: 📜 Repair Kit
repair_tool_recipe.description: Recipe for creating a repair kit.

pillow.name: 🧸 Pillow
pillow.description: After the sleep ends, the dinosaur receives a temporary energy boost.

blanket.name: ❤️ 🩹 Blanket
blanket.description: After the sleep ends, the dinosaur gains a temporary health boost.

transport_egg.name: 🦖 Transport egg
transport_egg.description: An egg for transporting a dinosaur. Use: If there is no dinosaur, place the dinosaur and freeze it. If there is a dinosaur: pulls out and thaws the dinosaur. Deleted after 1 cycle of use.

breakdown.downgrade: 💥 | Due to his bad mood, the dinosaur threw the object very hard. This item could be an accessory.

inspiration.bank: 🥭 | Due to the great mood, the dinosaur receives an x{bonus} bonus to the quality of work in the bank! 💚 Send the dinosaur to the bank to use inspiration!

menu_text.about: 🤖 | Hello! I'm @{bot_name}, and here's some information about me! 🗝️ | Statistics: 👥 {col_u} 🦕 {col_d} 🔮 {col_i} {update_time} ago.

menu_text.skills_actions:
📍 | Go to the skill leveling menu! 

💪 | Leveling up skills is a difficult and long process, when sending a dinosaur to training, make sure that he is full, and also has enough strength to train! 

❗ | Keep in mind that the dinosaur does not return from training on its own without consequences, you must do it. Keep an eye on the condition of the dinosaur and follow the recommendations!
menu_text.speed_actions: ⌚ | Quick actions - works instantly, but can be used again after a while.

en.no_text_key: ❌ The text corresponding to key {key} is not found, contact the developer @AS1AW!

ChooseDino.error_not_dino: ❓ | Dinosaurs are not a number, text or emojis, they are a living creature, try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseInt.error_not_int: ❓ | After conducting a structural analysis of the data, we determined that you did not enter a number, try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseInt.error_max_int: ❓ | The specified number is greater than the maximum ({number} > {max}), try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseInt.error_min_int: ❓ | The specified number is less than the minimum ({number} < {min}), try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseString.error_max_len: ❓ | The message length is longer than the allowed length ({number} > {max}), try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseString.error_min_len: ❓ | The message length is less than the allowed length ({number} < {min}), try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseConfirm.error_not_confirm: ❓ | Select one of the options provided. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseOption.error_not_option: ❓ | Are you trying to go beyond the world? It is not worth it. Choose from the available options. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseTime.zero_seconds:
❓ | It is required to enter a message in time format, use the memo - /string_to_sec click
Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseTime.error_max_int: ❓ | The time you specified is longer than the maximum ({number} > {max}), try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseTime.error_min_int: ❓ | The time you specified is less than the minimum ({number} < {min}), try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

en.no_use_interface:
❌ While in a dungeon, use the dungeon interface! 

 If there is a mistake and you leave the dungeon, write down /check_dinos
en.no_account: You do not have a registered account in the bot, please go to the bot and register for access to this command.
en.add_me: ❤ | Everyone can send a friend request {username} by clicking on the button below!
en.in_development: This feature is in development, stay tuned to find out when the team will start working!

start_command.referal: 🔗 I noticed a click on an up-to-date referral link!
start_command.first_message: 🦖 | Hey {username}, glad to see you! I'm a little game bot like Tamagotchi, only with dinosaurs! 🥚 | What is Tamagotchi? Tamagotchi is a game with a virtual pet that needs to be fed, cared for, played, etc. 🗻 | What kind of bot? In this bot, you have to take care of your pet, travel, conquer the dungeon and fully immerse yourself in this RPG world! 🎮 | How do I start playing? Click the 🍡 Start Playing button! ❤ | Get ready to pay attention to your dinosaur, happy playing!

request_subscribe.text:
📜 | Dear User! 

🎭 | The bot has an official telegram channel and a group, go to the group to find a topic for conversation or ask questions, as well as subscribe to the channel to receive interesting bonuses and news! 

❤ | It is not necessary, but we will be very grateful to you! 

⏳ | Wait a bit, an image will be generated now...

start_command.start_game:
🥚 | Choose a dinosaur egg! 

🦖 | No matter which egg you choose, you will get a cute dinosaur.

end_answer.send_text:
🧸 | Congratulations, you have your first dinosaur! 

🍱 | At the moment, the egg is incubating, and in `{inc_time}` it will hatch into a dinosaur! 

🎋 | To see the latest information about the egg, press the button `129430 Dinosaur`! 

📔 | While you wait, study the interface, read the FAQ, customize the bot for yourself!

help.long: 🥏 List of all commands in the bot.

cancel.long:
🛡️ Cancel any selection state. 
× 🪀 Example: You are creating a product for the market to undo it at any stage - use this command.

start.long: 💥 The first thing the bot sees from you is start, but in other cases, you can go to the main menu with this command.

profile.long: 🎋 An alternative to the information command, a general summary of the user. When replying to another user's message, it will display information about him.

add_me.long: 🎃 A command to quickly add friends through a group.

promo.long: ⛏️ Follow the news in the channel to get promo codes more often!

super.long: 🧺 Watch ads - get super coins - exchange them in the premium store!

timer.long: ⏳ Enter the number of seconds that will be converted to time in the output.

string_to_sec.long: 🪵 Prompt for entering the time in places such as creating an auction.

pushinfo.short: Tooltip for publishing products in the channel
pushinfo.long: 🪵 Prompt for entering the time in places such as creating an auction.

delete_push.long: 🪵 Delete a notification in a channel.

create_tracking.long: 💥 Creating a Track Link to Track Login Through /start

tracking.long: 🛡️ List of track links tracked through /start

promos.long: 🛡️ List and management of promo codes

link_promo.long: 🛡️ To bind the promo code button to a message, you need to respond to the message with a command, and the bot must also be in the channel.

add_premium.long:
🛡️ Issuance of a premium time subscription
× 0 - issue a premium to yourself, str_time - time format. The second argument is that if it is empty, then forever, otherwise for a while.

get_username.short: Returning the User class by userid
get_username.long: 🛡️ Returning the User class by userid

group_settings.long: 🌐 Manage group settings. Setting the working topic, deletion time.

en.command_dino_prof: 🥚 | You don't have any dinosaurs at the moment, please check your inventory. You should have an egg in your inventory that you can incubate!

faq.text: 🍿 | Hey, our bot is quite large, and there is a lot of information. Here are a couple of categories for you, choose what information you want to get >
faq.game_point:
🦕 In DinoGochi, you become the owner of a unique dinosaur. Our game combines the atmosphere of classic Tamagotchi with elements of a role-playing game (RPG): you take care of your pet, develop his skills, participate in adventures and competitions. 

🎋 However, DinoGochi is not only about caring. Your path is determined by you:
- You can focus on developing your dinosaur by training it and unlocking new abilities. 
 - Or engage in trade in rare resources, building their own economy. 
- Or maybe you want to explore the world, participate in events, team up with other players, or compete for the title of the strongest. 

✨ DinoGochi is an open sandbox where you choose your own playstyle. 
 Grow, trade, explore, conquer — or just enjoy life with your dinosaur.
faq.dino_mood:
🎈 *What is dinosaur mood?* 
 The mood reflects the general state of your dinosaur: how happy, satisfied and ready for new adventures he is. It is important to monitor the mood so that the pet develops faster and is more effective in traveling. 

🍎 *What does the mood depend on?*
Your mood depends on your attention: play with the dinosaur, take care of it, feed it its favorite foods, and don't forget about communication. The more care, the better the mood! 

👀 *Where to see the dinosaur's mood?*
You can see the current mood in your dinosaur's profile. We display it through special indicators and color labels. 

💥 *What gives a good or bad mood?*
In a good mood, the dinosaur receives useful bonuses: it develops faster, fights more successfully and copes with tasks more easily. With low mood, nervous breakdowns are possible: the dinosaur may refuse to follow commands or lose motivation.
faq.dino_height:
*🌱 What about the growth of dinosaurs?*
 A dinosaur grows within 30 days of birth. However, each dinosaur is unique: some can grow into large creatures, and some will remain small.
faq.kindergarten:
🏫 *What is a kindergarten?*
Kindergarten is a premium feature that allows you to send your dinosaur to kindergarten for a few hours a day. At this time, the pet is cared for and he remains in a good mood.
faq.dino_skills:
🎯 *What are dinosaur skills?*
Skills are characteristics that directly affect the success of your dinosaur in different activities. They are pumped through training and unlock various bonuses. 

🌟 *What bonuses do skills give?*
- With high charisma, there is a chance to cancel a bad mood. 
 - Agility reduces the time to complete tasks. 
 - Charisma gives a discount on promotion. 
- High Charisma increases the chance of gaining additional experience in gathering, playing, traveling, and sleeping. 
- Gathering resources increases the chance of finding rarer items. 
- In games, the dinosaur receives an additional bonus with high charisma. 
- With high intelligence, there is a chance to create 1 more item at once. 

💪 *How to upgrade skills?*
Skills can be leveled up by sending the dinosaur to training. Different workouts develop different skills!
faq.settings:
⚙️ *What can be customized in the game?*
There are many options available in DinoGochi to make the game even more convenient:

- Turn off daily reward notifications. 
- Adjust the size of the inventory page. 
- Rename the dinosaur. 
- Configure the interface view for the profile. 
- Delete the account. 
- Customize how dinosaurs will name the host. 
- Select the language of the bot. 
- Establish permission to talk to the owner. 
- Set a nickname in the bot. 
- Reset the avatar. 

 All settings are available in a special section of the menu.
faq.friends:
🤝 *What are friends in DinoGochi?*
Friends allow you to interact with other players and develop a cooperative game. Friends Features:

- View a friend's profile. 
- Share coins and objects. 
 - Have dinosaurs together. 
- Change a friend's name for convenience. 
- Send dinosaurs to play together. 

👥 *How to become friends?*
You can add a friend through the special menu or by using the command `/add_me` in the group.
faq.referal:
💎 *What is a referral system?*
The referral system allows you to receive bonuses for inviting friends to the game. 

🤍 *How does the referral system work?*
After clicking on the referral link, you immediately become friends with the inviting player. 

💜 *What do I get when my friend reaches level 5?*
You get a rare or uncommon egg! 

❤️ *What will my friend get?*
A friend will receive the following bonuses: 255 coins, 🍯 Jar of Honey x2, 🍪 Cookies x2, 🧸 Teddy Bear, 🍗 Chicken Leg x2, 🍒 Berries x2, 🦪 Small Fish x2, 🎂 Cake
faq.market:
🏪 *What is a market?*
The market is a completely independent system for the exchange of items and coins. Each player can customize their store profile. 

🖼️ *Can I install a profile picture on the market?*
Yes, if you have a subscription, you can set your profile picture. 

💸 *What exchanges are available on the market?*
The following exchanges are available on the market:
- Exchange of items for coins and vice versa. 
 - Exchange of objects for objects. 
- Auction of items where the highest bid wins.
faq.dino_tavern:
🍻 *What is a tavern?*
A tavern is a place where you can get quests and hear fascinating stories. 

🎯 *What can you do in the tavern?*
- Get a quest that will give you additional tasks and bonuses. 
- Hear interesting stories that can provide clues for future adventures.
faq.events:
🎉 *What are events?*
Events are special events in the game that can appear both in the bot and as additional events. 

🎮 *What events are there?*
- Events in the bot are temporary tasks and activities that appear for a certain time. 
- Side events may include power-ups, new mechanics, or unique items that are available for a limited time.
faq.donate:
💖 *What do donations go to?*
Funds received from players are used for the following needs:

- Payment for hosting so that the bot always works stably. 
- Advertising to attract new players. 
- Rewards for the work of people who are engaged in the development of the bot. 
- A little for goodies to keep the team motivated.
faq.super_coins:
💎 *What are Super Coins?*
Super Coins are a special currency that can be obtained for watching ads or for donations.

🎁 *What can you buy with super coins?*
Super Coins can be spent on special items available by command `/super`
faq.more_dinos:
🐾 *How do you get more dinosaurs?*
The number of dinosaurs you can contain depends on the level and subscription:

- Every 20th level gives +1 dinosaur slot.
- For a premium subscription you get +1 slot.
- 1 co-op dinosaur slot is also always available.
faq.craft:
⚒️ *What is crafting?*
Crafting is the process of crafting items using recipes and materials. Some recipes take time to create.

📝 *Where can I find recipes?*
Recipes can be found at the market, from a hoarder, or on a trip.
faq.breakdown:
😣 *What is a nervous breakdown in a dinosaur?*
A nervous breakdown is a condition that can occur if a dinosaur is in too bad a mood.

⚠️ *How to prevent a nervous breakdown?*
To prevent a nervous breakdown, you need to boost your dinosaur's mood by paying attention, feeding, or doing other activities. If it doesn't work right away, just wait and your mood will improve over time.
faq.general:
🎈 *Rarity*
Events and dinosaurs are divided into rarities.
The higher the rarity, the sweeter the reward.

 1. Regular - 50%
 2. Uncommon - 25%
 3. Rare - 15%
 4. Mystical - 9%
 5. Legendary - 1%

🕹 *Interaction*
To interact with the dinosaur, go to `🕹 Actions`.

 1. In order to feed the dinosaur, you need to get food, click on `🕹 Actions` > `🍕 Food Gathering` and follow the instructions.

 2. To feed the dinosaur, click on `🕹 Actions` > `🍣 Feed` and select the appropriate food.

 3. In `🎮 Entertainment` you can choose a game and entertain the dinosaur to cheer him up.

 4. In `🎑 Travel` you can find different items, meet friends and see a lot of interesting things!

 5. `🌙 Put to bed` the dinosaur needs sleep every day, don't forget to put it to sleep!

🎮 *Profile*
 To view the inventory or find out your stats, go to `👁‍🗨 Profile`
faq.eat:
🥙 *What does my dinosaur eat?*
Look at your dinosaur's profile, dinosaurs live in their native environment.

Herbivores where there are a lot of grasses, predators in forests/jungles, and those who love fish fly in the clouds.

🍕 *Sweets*
🍯 Jar of honey, 🥞 Sweet pancakes - dinosaurs love treats and regardless of their species, they will gladly eat them!

This food also gives bonuses to mood / health, etc.

You can find out all the information about the item in the inventory!
faq.accessories:
🏓 *Accessories*
Accessories open up additional opportunities or speed up the type of activity. 
Accessories can be installed while the dinosaur is doing nothing by using it in the inventory.
Accessories can be found in travels or dungeons.

🎲 *Here are some of them...*
 🧸 Teddy Bear - allows you to choose a sleep mode.
 🛠 Tools - speed up food gathering.

We are a team working on the bot only on our own. The bot is free and constantly evolving for you. If you like the bot, you could support it with a coin!

tavern_dialogs: They say terrible monsters roam in the dungeons...
My dinosaur can kill 20 of these!
Don't tell me, ha ha ha!
They say the items in the dungeon are high-end...
Yesterday I walked, some kind of glowing stone fell out to me...
Have you seen what a terrible face this goblin has?!
Yes, I eat them for breakfast!
How do they fight with these blunt swords?
I'm not going back there!
Are you afraid to go down to the dungeon?!
My friend Bari went there 21 years ago, I'm still waiting...
Yesterday I saw the Hero coming out of the dungeon with a golden sword!
Don't tell tales, there's no one scary there!
Tell me how you lost your eye in this dungeon...
Let me not be afraid! There are just no coins to enter...
What time will it be, the 21st? And how much have you already taken out of there?
Yes, uh...
No, no...
Kidding?
AHA HA HA!
Ho ho ho...
Are You Running Into Trouble?!
Drink?!
Good news, pour!
Piggy Piggy
Demon....
They say that there are many treasures hidden in the dungeons...
My dinosaur can cut any monster into pieces!
It is said that ancient evil spirits dwell in the dungeons...
I found 2 gold coins in the dungeon!
I heard that in the dungeon you can find a secret passage to the treasures...
